lede.title: Lede Story Item
lede.description: Default lede story item layout: top aligned A1 image with header and excerpt.

publication-listing.title: Publication Listing Story Item
publication-listing.description: Story item layout for publication listing: left aligned A3 image (right when on mobile).

list-item.title: List Item
list-item.description: Story item layout for list items: no excerpt, no image.

newsletter-glue.title: Newsletter Glue
newsletter-glue.description: Newsletter Glue compatible version of a Story Item, ready for Mailchimp markup.
